articles.title: Trump exempts smartphones and computers from new tariffs - BBC
articles.description: It follows concerns that tech prices could skyrocket, as many gadgets are made in China, with the US president saying he will give more detail on Monday.
articles.content:
Madeline Halpert
US President Donald Trump's administration has exempted smartphones, computers and some other electronic devices from "reciprocal" tariffs, including the 125% levies imposed on Chin… [+3750 chars]

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Researchers find AI is pretty bad at debugging—but they’re working on it - Ars Technica
articles.description: Even when given access to tools, AI agents can’t reliably debug software.
